message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential worth to you, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.  What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to move a bit closer to your price, but $1,200,000 is still quite a gap from what I have in mind. How about we meet in the middle at $1,250,000? I believe this reflects the true value of the product.

I understand your position, Alice. While I value the product, my budget constraints are firm. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,225,000. I believe this brings us closer together without exceeding my financial limits.
